description: This course is a service/learning experience.  Week one is on-campus learning basic clinical
techniques, examining emerging disease, and existing health care issues. Students will spend three
weeks in Cuzco, Peru assessing patient needs in a public hospital, a homeless shelter, orphanages,
and a small village. Week four will involve discussion and writing reflective journals.
Prerequisites: Biology 125 or Chemistry/Biology 125-127, and Biology 291.  Apply through the
